We will use sql commands to interact with the database on the server. Here is a quick list of sql commands.

http://www.pantz.org/software/mysql/mysqlcommands.html

Lullabot tutorial on SQL commands for Drupal users

http://www.lullabot.com/videos/command-line-basics-mysql

In order to interact with the database on ETC server, we need Putty installion on the machine, in case it is not installed already. It can downloaded from http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/

Typical Putty session
